segments.text: I see the dishes stacked high on the counter, waiting for their turn to be cleaned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman looks so diligent, polishing each plate as if it demands her utmost attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I feel a wave of sadness for her, being so absorbed while chaos brews behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she feels overwhelmed with everything she has to do in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of the overflowing sink just adds to the burden she doesn’t notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how the water will leave stains and damages she’ll have to deal with later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are like little conspirators, quietly plotting their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s both sweet and a little maddening to see them so eager and carefree.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way they’re working together is heartwarming, even though I know it’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a mix of admiration for their ingenuity and fear for their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR
